dt-example.title: Pane Customisation
dt-example.info:
This is the searchPanes extension for DataTables. It allows results to be filtered based on the values of columns.
This example shows the deactivation of the search box by setting the searchPanes dtOpts property for `-init searching` to have a value of false and allowing the `- init info` of the third columns pane to be true. The default for `-init searching` is true and `-init info` is false. This occurs on all of the panes, the `-init info` is displayed only on the second column's pane.
